headline: ConocoPhillips (COP) Valuation Check as Shares Grind Higher but Trail Over the Past Year
summary: What the latest move in ConocoPhillips stock might be telling investors ConocoPhillips (COP) has been quietly grinding higher, with shares up about 5% over the past month even as the stock is still slightly negative over the past year. That mix of short term momentum and longer term underperformance sets up an interesting question for investors, especially with steady revenue and net income growth suggesting that fundamentals may be improving faster than the share price. See our latest...
